item.description:
First off, sorry for the short notice; I was just able to confirm a location today. Our first meet-up will be held at the Redline Bar in Harvard Square, the evening of Thursday, June 18th, at 7:15-7:30 ish.

The address is:
59 JFK Street | Cambridge, MA 02138

We have a private room in the back, where we can hang out, have some drinks, talk about Grails, and people can show off their work. I know I'd be curious to see what others have done and meet you all So, feel free to bring a laptop (not 100% sure on internet connectivity being available).

Hope to see you all then!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess about 'Grails meeting' or room under the name 'Steve Pember"
item.name: First Meeting!
